SourceString: A Desperate Flight
I must escape Nemesis
I escaped Nemesis
What\'s happening? Why is the goddess Nemesis trying to punish me? Thank the gods Aristonoe arrived when she did, or I never would have escaped.
I made my escape, but Nemesis killed my mentor, Aristonoe. Now, I must find a way to the Moirai temple on my own.
Jump down the cliff and run
Find a place to hide from Nemesis
Flee through the cave
Talk to Aristonoe
Set sail
The Queen of the Mountain
I should go to Mount Proti and defeat the gryphon
I defeated the gryphon and destroyed its nest
For months, a gryphon and its cultists have terrorized Proti island. I have received the blessing of the gods. It\'s time to put a stop to the gryphon\'s tyranny.
Proti island is safe. But no heroic deed goes unpunished...
Reach the gryphon\'s nest
Find the ruins passage
Receive the blessing from the shrine
Defeat the gryphon
Destroy the gryphon\'s nest
I should defeat the gryphon and destroy its nest
Defend Proti Village
I must save the villagers from the gryphon cultists.
I defended the village
The gryphon has struck again! Its greedy followers are plundering Proti village for gold. The villagers need my help.
I rescued the villagers and warded off the gryphon cult\'s attack, but they won\'t truly be safe until the gryphon is defeated.
Run to the village
Free the village from the gryphon cultists
Speak to Laodamia in the village center
Defeat the gryphon cultists
Speak to Laodamia by the village gate
The Hunt Begins
I should prepare to hunt the gryphon with my mentor Aristonoe.
I am ready to fight the gryphon

For years, I\'ve trained on Proti island with my mentor Aristonoe. Now, I must prepare to face my greatest challenge yet. A gryphon stalks Proti island and terrorizes the people with its band of cultists. Someone needs to stop it.

I received the blessing of divine mastery from the ancient shrine on Proti island. Aristonoe believes I\'m now ready to face the gryphon. But she seemed concerned. After I received my blessing the shrine was corrupted by a dark energy. Aristonoe remained behind to investigate the cause.
Enter the mysterious cave
Approach the ancient shrine
Defeat the undead guardians
Speak to Aristonoe
Receive the blessing of divine mastery at the altar
Speak to Aristonoe
